alert.note: Alert for Meade (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 09 at 4:25AM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Harrison and north central Meade Counties through 500 AM EDT... At 425 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southwest of Corydon, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southern Harrison and north central Meade Counties, including the following locations... Central, New Middletown, Valley City, Dogwood, New Amsterdam and Glidas. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
